from sys_permission
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update sys_permission
PERMISSION_ID = #{record..permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PERMISSION_NAME = #{record..permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record..description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_RIGHTS = #{record..addRights,jdbcType=BIT},
ADD_TITLE = #{record..addTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_RIGHTS = #{record..deleteRights,jdbcType=BIT},
DELETE_TITLE = #{record..deleteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDIT_RIGHTS = #{record..editRights,jdbcType=BIT},
EDIT_TITLE = #{record..editTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIEW_RIGHTS = #{record..viewRights,jdbcType=BIT},
VIEW_TITLE = #{record..viewTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPORT_RIGHTS = #{record..importRights,jdbcType=BIT},
IMPORT_TITLE = #{record..importTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPORT_RIGHTS = #{record..exportRights,jdbcType=BIT},
EXPORT_TITLE = #{record..exportTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record..createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{record..creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record..modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{record..modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_permission set PERMISSION_ID = #{record..permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PERMISSION_NAME = #{record..permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{record..description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_RIGHTS = #{record..addRights,jdbcType=BIT}, ADD_TITLE = #{record..addTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_RIGHTS = #{record..deleteRights,jdbcType=BIT}, DELETE_TITLE = #{record..deleteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDIT_RIGHTS = #{record..editRights,jdbcType=BIT}, EDIT_TITLE = #{record..editTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIEW_RIGHTS = #{record..viewRights,jdbcType=BIT}, VIEW_TITLE = #{record..viewTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORT_RIGHTS = #{record..importRights,jdbcType=BIT}, IMPORT_TITLE = #{record..importTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPORT_RIGHTS = #{record..exportRights,jdbcType=BIT}, EXPORT_TITLE = #{record..exportTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record..createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{record..creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record..modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{record..modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_permission
PERMISSION_NAME = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_RIGHTS = #{addRights,jdbcType=BIT},
ADD_TITLE = #{addTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_RIGHTS = #{deleteRights,jdbcType=BIT},
DELETE_TITLE = #{deleteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDIT_RIGHTS = #{editRights,jdbcType=BIT},
EDIT_TITLE = #{editTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIEW_RIGHTS = #{viewRights,jdbcType=BIT},
VIEW_TITLE = #{viewTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPORT_RIGHTS = #{importRights,jdbcType=BIT},
IMPORT_TITLE = #{importTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPORT_RIGHTS = #{exportRights,jdbcType=BIT},
EXPORT_TITLE = #{exportTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PERMISSION_ID = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_permission set PERMISSION_NAME = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_RIGHTS = #{addRights,jdbcType=BIT}, ADD_TITLE = #{addTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_RIGHTS = #{deleteRights,jdbcType=BIT}, DELETE_TITLE = #{deleteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDIT_RIGHTS = #{editRights,jdbcType=BIT}, EDIT_TITLE = #{editTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIEW_RIGHTS = #{viewRights,jdbcType=BIT}, VIEW_TITLE = #{viewTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORT_RIGHTS = #{importRights,jdbcType=BIT}, IMPORT_TITLE = #{importTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPORT_RIGHTS = #{exportRights,jdbcType=BIT}, EXPORT_TITLE = #{exportTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PERMISSION_ID = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
